WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr3 is still being implemented and is not in Beta stages yet
WorkItem.Description: In both the online and offline Silverlight versions, the only modules with a non-empty "Options" tab (the one next to "Buffs", not the dropdown at the top) are the Healadin and Retadin modules. Those two modules appear to display their options normally, but the rest  just display an empty pane with nothing in it.
WorkItem.Summary: Silverlight: Most modules have empty "Options" tab

Comments.Message: This is just because the Silverlight version requires the developers to implement a new options panel, and other ones have not yet.
